meanings.sent1: The amendment was constitutionalized to ensure it was part of the constitution.
meanings.sent2: The new law was constitutionalized by adding it to the constitution.
meanings.sent3: The idea of pizza for breakfast was constitutionalized by the kids in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for music was constitutionalized into every note she played.
meanings.sent5: The image of the flag waving in the wind was constitutionalized in the minds of the citizens.

meanings.sent1: The court ruling constitutionalized the controversial law.
meanings.sent2: The decision to include freedom of speech constitutionalized the new constitution.
meanings.sent3: The cat's demand for treats was constitutionalized by the family's rules.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work constitutionalized his reputation as a hard worker.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was constitutionalized by the artist's painting.
